lead_paragraph: Rory McIlroy loved the look of Riviera Country Club when he first saw the course earlier this week, and now relishes the prospect of being in the title hunt for the Northern Trust Open on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Rory Ready for Final-Round Shootout on Riviera Debut
headline.main: Rory Ready for Final-Round Shootout on Riviera Debut

snippet: Rory McIlroy loved the look of Riviera Country Club when he first saw the course earlier this week, and now relishes the prospect of being in the title hunt for the Northern Trust Open on Sunday....
